short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An intuitive pixel art editor for quick and easy pixel art creations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pixel Studio - Your Ultimate Browser-Based Pixel Art Editor

Unleash your creativity with Pixel Studio, a comprehensive online pixel art editor designed to make pixel-perfect creations quick and easy, all from your browser. Whether you're an experienced pixel artist or a beginner, Pixel Studio offers a user-friendly interface packed with powerful pixel art tools to bring your ideas to life.

Key Features:

-Free: No need to purchase anything! All features come free out of the box!
-Intuitive Interface: Navigate effortlessly with a clean and straightforward design, perfect for pixel artists of all skill levels.
-Advanced Pixel Art Tools: Access a variety of tools like the paint bucket, zooming, and panning, essential for creating detailed pixel art.
-Seamless Performance: Enjoy a smooth and responsive pixel art editing experience with no need for downloads or installations.
-Export and Share Pixel Art: Easily export your pixel art creations in multiple formats and share them with your friends or on social media.
-Built-in Storage: All your progress will save in the browser, so you will never lose your precious creation!

Transform your artistic vision into stunning pixel art with Pixel Studio. Start creating pixel-perfect art today, straight from your browser!
